Interface tripleplay.util.Frames

Changed Methods
void apply(int, ImageLayer) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Configures the supplied image layer with the specified frame.
int count() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the number of frames available.
Image frame(int) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the image for the specified frame.
float height() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the height of a logical frame.
IPoint offset(int) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the offset (into the logical bounds) of the specified frame.
float width() Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Returns the width of a logical frame.
